the last post you have on the forum doesn't make much sense to me. please try this: open a terminal window, then type this and press enter when ready: nc -vv s0.wordpress.com 80
you should then get to see this message: "Connection to s0.wordpress.com 80 port [tcp/www] succeeded!"

if you get to see this message, please type this next: GET / HTTP/1.1
then: Host: s0.wordpress.com
then press enter twice
you should then see this: http://pastebin.com/5S5VNT9C
it's possible that your connection drops and you get bumped back to the shell if you type too slowly. if this happens then just restart from the 'nc' command above
